text:
Hovey — 5
HOVEYj Well, so help me, I didn’t give Marshall Bialosky any coaching on the content
of that statement. I hope to continue this story of the American Fulbrighters in the next
Letter from Italy.
Graham Hovey reporting. This Letter from Italy was recorded in Perugia and Rome for
the National Association of Educational Broadcasters — and this is the NAEB Network.
